// Facility or Academy Detail Fields Noida Stadium Noida Cricket Stadium, Noida 6:00 AM – 7:00 PM 29th December 7:00 AM – 6:00 PM Week Off Sat,Sun,Mon,Tue,Wed,thur
Noida Cricket Stadium, also known as Noida Stadium Complex, is a cricket stadium in Noida, India. It is located in Sector 21A of Noida, Uttar Pradesh. As of April 2017,the playing area and the stands for the stadium have been built, with the seating and media facilities still being completed. Area Rio Olympics Wrestling Delhi Mayur Vihar 843311
